#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

int lucky(int n)
{
	if(n<=9)
	{
		return n;
	}
	int a=0;
	
	while(n>0)
	{
		a+=n%10;
		n/=10;
	}
	
	lucky(a);
}
	
int main(void)
{
	char Months[][15]={"0", "January", "February", "March", "April", "May", "June", "July", "August", "September", "October", "November", "December"};
	
	int date, month, year, i, num;
	char temp[15];
	
	scanf("%d",&date);
	scanf("%s",temp);
	scanf("%d",&year);
	
	for(i=1; i<=12; i++)
	{
		if(strcmp(temp, Months[i])==0)
		{
			month=i;
			break;
		}
	}
	
	num=date*month+year;
	
	num=lucky(num);
	
	printf("%d\n",num);
	
	return 0;
}
